sentences.en: An airliner came close to disaster while approaching Heathrow Airport.
sentences.cn: 一架大型客机在飞近希思罗机场时差点儿发生空难。

sentences.en: Barry held the bowls while Liz ladled soup into them.
sentences.cn: 巴里负责端着碗，由利兹向碗里盛汤。

sentences.en: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
sentences.cn: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

sentences.en: He was caught out while lapping a slower rider.
sentences.cn: 他在套圈超越一位落后的车手时出了错。

sentences.en: He was lost in the con-templation of the landscape for a while.
sentences.cn: 有一会儿，他怔怔地注视着周围的景物。

sentences.en: I filled the kettle while she was talking and plugged it in.
sentences.cn: 她说话间，我把水壶灌满并插上了电源。

sentences.en: I'll make the tea and you pop off for a while.
sentences.cn: 我来备茶，你去歇一会儿吧。

sentences.en: I'm a limited and obtuse clergyman while you're the expert.
sentences.cn: 你是专家，而我是个能力有限的愚笨牧师。

sentences.en: It takes a while to recover from the operation.
sentences.cn: 手术后需要一段时间恢复。

sentences.en: Jim Coulters will mind the store while I'm away.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候吉姆·库尔特斯会照看店铺的。

sentences.en: Mommy, you don't need to stay while we talk.
sentences.cn: 妈妈,我们谈话时你不必陪着.

sentences.en: Sailors hung about while they waited to ship out.
sentences.cn: 水手们在等待离港的时候四处闲逛。

sentences.en: Schools in the north tend to be better equipped, while those in the south are relatively poor.
sentences.cn: 北方的学校设施往往要好一些，而南方的学校则相对差一些。

sentences.en: She met Andy while working on a production of Carmen.
sentences.cn: 排练《卡门》时，她认识了安迪。

sentences.en: They arrived while we were having dinner.
sentences.cn: 他们来时我们正在吃饭。

sentences.en: We sat in Lily's sunroom while I sketched in the situation.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在莉莉的日光浴室里，我把目前形势的细节情况又补充说明了一下。

sentences.en: While he was gone she had tea with the Colonel.
sentences.cn: 他不在时她跟上校一起喝了茶。

sentences.en: While she was asleep, thieves broke in and stole her handbag.
sentences.cn: 她睡着的时候，小偷闯进来偷走了她的手提包。

sentences.en: While the water was heating she decided to shake out the carpet.
sentences.cn: 趁着烧水的时候，她决定将地毯抖抖干净。

sentences.en: Will you lend me your jacket for a little while?
sentences.cn: 你能把上衣借给我穿一会儿吗？

phrases.tran_cn: 一段时间之前，不久之前；前阵子
有一阵子，半天；相当长一段时间
值得某人花时间（精力等）

trans.tran_cn: 在…期间，与…同时，然而，尽管
trans.tran_en: during the time that something is happening
a period of time, especially a short one
to spend time in a pleasant and lazy way
